name: Epic
flavor: Your story tells a tale of the villain's waning power and how the heroes rose to the occasion to stop them.

metadata.flavor: Your story tells a tale of the villain's waning power and how the heroes rose to the occasion to stop them.

effects.tier1: The target takes a bane on ability rolls (save ends).
effects.tier2: The target has a double bane on ability rolls (save ends).
effects.tier3: The target has a double bane on power rolls (save ends).

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Choose one ally within distance. While the target is affected by this ability, each time they use an ability, that ally can make a free strike against them after the ability is resolved.
